entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 27. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness near noon. 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 27. Wind chill minus 44 this morning and minus 32 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 31. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight then partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 31. Wind chill minus 32 this evening and minus 40 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 23. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy in the afternoon with 30 percent chance of flurries later in the afternoon. Wind becoming east 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 23.
